we'll make you memorable.

The Ultimate Content Creator Template

Clients will line up and beg to work with you… no matter your rate!

Since creators are forever expanding their businesses with new ventures like digital products, blogging, collabs, virtual assisting, etc., we designed this template to support you in your growing business.

The Ultimate Content Creator Template was designed for content creators who want easily update their website and media kit from anywhere in the world and EVEN ON THEIR MOBILES. This clean and simple website template for content creators is highly rated with 5/5.

This is an amazing template to use for someone like me who is new to having a website! Candy and Jonty are super helpful and supportive and helped me to look like a real pro!! - Arielle Wizman, @ariellewizman

view demo

What's included

Content Blocks

This template comes with 10+ content blocks that can be easily duplicated, customized and used across multiple pages.

  • Hero image
  • x2 Services/projects
  • About
  • Reviews
  • Gallery
  • Gallery with links
  • Contact form
  • Media kit

    • Media Kit

    The Ultimate Content Creator Template comes with a media kit that can either be made visible in your navigation or hidden (to send to potential brands only). The media kit page was design specifically by Through the Lyns, a creator coach and master brand collaborator. No more sending pitches with PDF's that are likely to go to spam- this template will provide you with a neat link that directs to your media kit.

    Connect Tree

    This popular feature is a must for all creators! Create your own version on Linktree using our Conntect Tree page.

    Here are all the benefits of Connect Tree
  • Multiple links on a single page
  • Your own personalized link
  • SEO optimized
  • Powerful SEO tool (Link in bio)
  • Customizable
  • Easy-to-use

    • Next Gen Navigation

    Basically, the easiest and most convenient way to add links to your header. A single navigation that is both neat and stylish for all device types. In other words, it works well on desktop, laptop, tablet and mobile. This navigation also includes links to your social media accounts.

    With our next gen navigation, you'll never have to worry about a messy header or a website that is not user-friendly. This next gen navigation makes your website very easy for users to navigate!
